definitions.definition: Characterized by percussion ; caused by or related to the action of striking or pounding something.
examples: He massaged her shoulders with a gentle percussive action.

definitions.definition: Produced by striking organs together, for example, smacking the lips or gnashing the teeth .

main_definition: Characterized by percussion ; caused by or related to the action of striking or pounding something.
secondary_definitions: ( phonetics ) Produced by striking organs together, for example, smacking the lips or gnashing the teeth .
